short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: export your bookmarks, liked tweets and other stuff from twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
booksave is a browser extension that let's one export their bookmarks, liked tweets and their own media tweets from twitter.

why?

- if you're migrating to bluesky and you wish to preserve the media you saved on twitter, doing that by hand can quickly become tedious.
- archival purposes!
- why not?

booksave *does not* send your tweets for processing to some third-party server, everything happens on your machine and your machine only.

booksave is open-source software. you can find the code here: https://github.com/nedoxff/booksave
